text: Anthuwo ndi amene apirikitsidwa kuchokerakunyumbazawomopandachilungamochifukwa chakuti iwo anati, “Ambuye wathu ndi Mulungu.” Ndipo Mulungu akadapanda kuyesa anthu ena ndi mphamvu za anthu anzawo makachisi, matchalitchi, masunagoge ndi mizikiti imene dzina la Mulungu limatchulidwa kwambiri ikadaonongekeratu. Ndithudi Mulungu adzathandiza amene amathandiza chipembedzo chake. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi mphamvu ndiponso Wopambana kwambiri
